snippet: At Google's Zeitgeist conference, its chairman, Eric E. Schmidt, described a long-term future in which life is managed by robots - and one a little bit closer to reality, in which billions more people can get access to information with new devices...
abstract: At Google's Zeitgeist conference, its chairman, Eric E. Schmidt, described a long-term future in which life is managed by robots - and one a little bit closer to reality, in which billions more people can get access to information with new devices and connectivity.

headline.main: The Future, as Imagined by Google
